Class Filters

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.domain.filter.Filters
public final class Filters extends Object
Utility class providing ready-made task filters as building blocks for Combinator composition.

All methods are null-safe. Strings are trimmed and compared in lowercase where applicable.

      public static ITaskFilter titleContains(String needle)
      Returns a filter that matches tasks whose title contains the given substring, case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      needle - the substring to search for (nullable, treated as empty)
      Returns:
      a task filter matching by title
